entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
